blackBackgroundText.text: Enter Sam, a chubby, down-on-his-luck, failed samurai, recently fired from his job at Himeki castle. Jobless and weak, Sam seeks out his only comfort...

goonDialogue.text: Stuck on the night shift again? Man, I hate these rich bastards with their overpriced stuff.
I swear, if I get another long shift, I am going to lose it.
Pay's not even THAT good. And that old Himeki castle we have to guard gives me the creep.
I heard that there is a monster locked up in there. I pity the fool that tries to bust in and steal - what is it that we're guarding again?
Some sword in the middle of castle.
That's it! All that trouble for a sword?
Yup. Heard it gave the wielder unlimited powers or something, the Puracebo.
Oh shitake mushroom! Time to get going. Quick, get yourself a drink and let's get out of here-- our shifts start soon!
!!! Never mind the drink, let's get out of here before we get our pay docked!
7 SAKE AND 3 HOURS OF STUMBLING LATER

*rumble* 	*shuffling* 	 	*hiccup* 
 grrrr i'll show hirm-- i'm a great emphloyee
